Articles.Content:
Recreate the Apollo soyuz Orbital Meeting in KSP im currently doing it

Mods:any but no Cfg edits

GOGOGOOGOGO

Here some useful mods Soyuz/Noyuz: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4088.0

This can only when you have version 0.14. And if it\'s to hard you will only can docking in version 0.15.

Sorry for my English.

GoDamitt\'s Apollo pack and the Noyuz pack would be the ideal ones to use for this, though obviously any docking part is missing.

Also, the Apollo pack thread seems to have disappeared...

My closest approach so far was a flyby at under 300 meters.

It wasn\'t until I got up there that I realized that the Kerpollo CSM doesn\'t have any sas, so I was just kind of thrashing around here trying to get the thing to fly straight. I\'ve still got them in an orbit where they don\'t stray about more than 2km away from each other. I\'m going to switch over to the Noyuz and see if I have an easier time flying that to make the revdezvous.
Anyone have a mirror for the Apollo pack?

Also, the Apollo pack thread seems to have disappeared...

Yeah i noticed as well

It should be at kspyard.com

it is.
I think I still have the parts and ships for it. Holding onto them in case something catastrophic happens...

Yeah i noticed as well

I believe he left the forums in anger over something in the My Little Pony Thread.

Dumb on all sides.

I\'m trying it now with the Soyez mod and I will update this message soon.

I try it with version 0.13 and here my results (the best picture is screenshot 9):
